name: Touch of Radium
description:
[ A Global Gamejam 2022 Project ] 

You are a doctor or something in 1920's trying to heal people with radium and jazz. Use your mouse and try to kill all the virus, but watch out for the mutation. It's a funapocalypse!

Sam Feng - Programming - @samfenggames

Eizi Yu - VFX - https://eizimailcom.itch.io/

Jose Salas - Modeling - @salas_games

Franco Toledo - Music & Sounds - @shawntrrttll
